revised_title: Cryobiology: Challenges and Progress in Freezing Mammalian Cells and Tissues
tldr: The discussion focuses on the challenges and progress made in freezing mammalian cells and tissues. The effects of freezing on cells, the role of glycerol in protecting cells, and the differences in freezing requirements for various cell types are explored. The viability of whole animals after freezing and potential future advancements in cryobiology are also considered.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology and Tissue Engineering
